short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy the current url to your clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This small utility extension lets you copy the URL of the current tab to your system clipboard for easy sharing.

From any page, press the keyboard shortcut and the current URL will be copied to the clipboard, ready to be pasted whereever you need it.

Defautl keyboard shortcut is CTRL+CMD+C for macOS and CTRL+SHIFT+C for all other operating systems.
